15 #define HWPL_TEST_BIT(x,y) (x & (1<<y))
16 #define HWPL_SET_BIT(x,y) (x |= (1<<y))
17 #define HWPL_SET_MASK(x,y) (x |= y)
18 #define HWPL_CLR_BIT(x,y) (x &= ~(1<<y))
19 #define HWPL_CLR_MASK(x,y) (x &= ~y)

29

31

36 #define HWPL_NAKED __attribute__((naked))

47 #define HWPL_NEVER_INLINE __attribute__((noinline))

57 typedef int (*hwpl_callback_t)(void*,const void*);

69 #define HWPL_SYS_MEM __attribute__((section(".sysmem")));

77 typedef struct {
78  uint8_t channel ;
79  int event ;
80  hwpl_callback_t callback ;
81  void * context ;
82 } hwpl_action_t;

89  HWPL_SIGCODE_NEW_DATA = (1<<1),
90  HWPL_SIGCODE_EVENT = (1<<2)
91 } hwpl_sigcode_bitmask_t;
